head.title: Asian Fruit Salad with Papaya-Mint Sauce

ing.item: Peeled whole lychees in heavy syrup; drained, halved lengthwise
Papaya; peeled, seeded (about 1 1/2 cups) coarsely chopped

directions.step:
Mix first 6 ingredients in large bowl. (can be made 4 hours ahead. Cover; chill.) Spoon fruit into 6 small bowls or goblets. Drizzle Papaya-Mint Sauce over fruit. Sprinkle with coconut. Garnish with mint.
Payapa-Mint Sauce: Puree all ingredients in processor until smooth. Transfer to bowl. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
This sauce is also nice over vanilla frozen yogurt.
Per Serving (with sauce): Calories 208; total fat 2 g; saturated fat 1 g; cholesterol 0
Sauce per 2 1/2 tablespoons serving: Calories 73; total fat 0; saturated fat 0; cholesterol 0
